Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ke kaloku Samdala umntu yaye Siyakwazi okusetyezwa ngumphefumlo wakhe kuye. Kwaye Thina Sisondele kuye kunomthovutho2 wakhe
Xa abamkeli3 ababini besamkela behleli ekunene nasekhohlo
Akukho nalinye ilizwi umntu alithethayo koko kuba sele kukho umqwalaseli osele elungele (ukubhala)
Kananjalo ukuyoba kokufa kuya kuza nenyaniso; ebenizama ukuyiphepha
Ke kaloku neXilongo liya kuvuthelwa. Leyo iya kuba iyiMini isilumkiso sasikhutshiwe (ngayo)
Umphefumlo ngamnye uya kuza nomqhubi (wawo) nengqina
(Kuya kuthiwa kuwo): “Wena wawungayinanzanga (le Mini), Sisisusile ke isigqubuthelo kuwe, (ngoku) ukubona kwakho naMhlanje kubukhali.”
Aze umqhubi wawo (ingelosi) athi: “Lo Umbhalo ngulo ukum, sele ulungiswe kakade.”
(UAllâh Uya kuthi): “Phosa esiHogweni wonke osisingcoli esineenkani ongakholwayo.”
Uya kuthi uAllâh kulowo ungumoni: “Mthinteli ndini wokulungileyo, mgabadeli ndini, mthandabuzi ndini
Lowo (walinganisa) thixo bambi noAllâh.” (Aphinde Athi kwingelosi emqhubayo): “Mphose esohlwayweni esibuhlungu.”
Umhlobo wakhe (uSathana) uya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, asindim owamenza ukuba abe ngumgabadeli koko nguye ngokwakhe owaba sekulahlekeni (okwambeka) kude.”
(UAllâh) Uya kuthi: “Musani ukuphikisana phambi kwaM, ekubeni Ndandinilumkisile kwangenxa engaphambili.”
Ilizwi (elingummiselo) aliyi kuguqulwa kuM yaye Andisokuze Ndibe ngumsweli bulungisa kwizicaka
